name: CareerAIM
overview:
CareerAIM.com is by far Canada’s largest source for job opportunities. We connect people with more new job opportunities each month than all other job boards combined. CareerAIM.com applications significantly reduce recruiting costs while providing job seekers with the widest coverage available of the Canadian job market.

CareerAIM.com was founded in 2003 by David Forster and Dan Franzblau. Their vision was to build Canada’s most comprehensive source for job opportunities. Today, CareerAIM.com is recognized by many professionals as Canada’s premier job search technology solution with products serving:

Job Seekers Employers Public Libraries Colleges and Universities Career Transition Firms Career Counsellors and Coaches Analysts of job market trends

At its core, CareerAIM.com is a search engine for jobs that indexes job market data from thousands of local sources daily: all levels of government, Usenet, not-for-profits, recruiters, corporate web sites, print media and many other sources. In addition, employers and recruiters post jobs on CareerAIM.com for free, removing the cost barriers presented by conventional advertising. As a result, we are able to capture the majority of new job opportunities published each day in Canada and make this information available to our clients.

This vast dataset also allows us to produce near real-time statistical reports showing Canadian job market trends. CareerAIM.com publishes the Canadian Job Market Report each month.

Client services are delivered using state-of-the-art virtualized servers housed in our Kanata facilities. The company has developed its job search technologies from the ground up.

CareerAIM.com is by far Canada’s largest source for job opportunities. We connect people with 200,000 new job opportunities each month. ——————————————————————————– Canada’s most comprehensive job bank. Six times the two largest commercial job boards combined. ——————————————————————————– For people who are serious about finding employment opportunities. We consolidate new job opportunities daily from thousands of independent sources.
